subtitle: Prawns do have a higher fat content than some fish, so eat in moderation.

method.text: Heat oil in a small saucepan. Fry salad onions and red pepper for 2-3 min.
Add ginger wine and boil until reduced by one third. Pour in the cream. Boil until reduced and thickened.
Stir in prawns and simmer for about 5 min or until thoroughly heated. Season to taste. Serve on warmed plates.

title: Prawns with ginger and cream sauce
